review: Surprisingly impressive!! Some movies are overrated and this one undoubtedly is UNDERRATED.100%trills and chills all u got to do is watch the movie where there isn't editing.You barely get to see this kind of horror.its engaging enough.This movie is really above the mediocre cliche horror served to us in recent times.(watch it where it isn't cut or edited coz that's where the core of the movie is,you'll get to know why a big ratio of ppl have loved the movie and have given a thumbs up to it on t ...MORE

Surprisingly impressive!! Some movies are overrated and this one undoubtedly is UNDERRATED.100%trills and chills all u got to do is watch the movie where there isn't editing.You barely get to see this kind of horror.its engaging enough.This movie is really above the mediocre cliche horror served to us in recent times.(watch it where it isn't cut or edited coz that's where the core of the movie is,you'll get to know why a big ratio of ppl have loved the movie and have given a thumbs up to it on the review page)  believe me the movie throughout has such scenes which will make u scream and i mean it.Plot,screenplay and Acting all are on point.You need to be receptive to whats happening on the screen and bull's eye youll get the jitters since then,just be into the story don't generalise or compare it at the very beginning.The debutants have done a fair job.At the end u yourself will feel trapped in there and will route for the Survival techniques employed by the leads.good job done by the team , A must watch!!! Thank me later 😊

I dont know if all the reviews are sarcastic or true.. but.. WHAT THE HELL WAS THIS? WHY DOES THIS EVEN EXIST??Lemme Keep it Short.

**SPOILER ALERT**

Build Up to the Plot-0

Some Random Strangers Randomly Decides to Stay in a "Haunted Hotel". Thats IT!

Spookiness-0

Cliche Jumpscares that were obvious a minute before they happened. If u have watched even a single horror movie you would have seen all the jumpscares coming.

PLOT- 0 

So they spend 50 minutes to realize sticking together will be safe(which actually is. For the first time u think they actually used their brains).....but, after finding out how to kill the ghost... THEY SPLIT UP ONCE AGAIN.........AND DIEEEEE...

Climax- 0

So the Ghost of the builder was just watching everything until 1 girl remains.. What is This PUBG? And then just turns on a fan and leaves... And the Girl like A Hindu Demi-Goddess PICKS THE FIRE ON HER BARE HANDS.. SLAPS IT ON THE GROUND BURNING THE THING POWERING THE GHOST.

Logic- 0

Now I know Horror Movies have little to no logic but this one blew my mind.. Quoting from the film(in english)
"THIS HOTEL HAS BEEN ABANDONED FOR YEARS..BUT LOOK AT THIS BULB, IT IS GLOWING. THAT MEANS IT IS GETTING ELECTRICITY, THAT MEANS THERE IS A GENERATOR, THAT MEANS THERE IS A WAY TO THIS GENERATOR.....THAT MEANS THERE IS A WAY OUTTTTTT!!!

Guys this was the real reason why Sherlock commited suicide on the Season 2 Episode 3.

Now I watched this movie as my cousins wanted something to enjoy and have fun and we decided on this because of the reviews..

Seriously, "One of the best Horror Movies of all time"?
IM DONE.

It is a horror classic for Hindi films. They could’ve done much more, with the expensive set up - but due to the lack of good direction...it turns to be  an okay horror film. It is not bad , so all of you who want to watch it- go ahead. You’re in for a scare, but you need to watch it more than three times, to actually understand the story. The cast performances are good, while a few have over acted. Karan Kundra seems pretty good, in his debut. I personally liked the film, but feel that they cou ...MORE

It is a horror classic for Hindi films. They could’ve done much more, with the expensive set up - but due to the lack of good direction...it turns to be  an okay horror film. It is not bad , so all of you who want to watch it- go ahead. You’re in for a scare, but you need to watch it more than three times, to actually understand the story. The cast performances are good, while a few have over acted. Karan Kundra seems pretty good, in his debut. I personally liked the film, but feel that they could’ve done so much with this .......it cannot frogleap English films, but definitely sets a new precedent for Hindi horror films.

I think this is the best horror movie ever made in Bollywood.  The plot is completely different but there is lack of direction. And some scenes are just illogical,  like why they all split together when  there many friends die.and they can wait until the morning. But if we ignore these scenes then the movie is good.

Felt it's underrated after seeing the rating at Google. Watched it today as suggested by my friend. Truly amazing. And everytime the ghost took each one of them, my mouth went open and I was in shock for 10-15 seconds. I liked it

Okay..So this film was scary first of all.I dont know why this film got only 4.4/10.I would rate it about 6.8/10.There were scary sounds and jumpscares throughout the film and you would get the creeps. the newcomers have done moderately successful performances,all within a 90 minute duration.However, at a few instances..I did feel that the film did not fully deliver on what it could have achieved.And some scenes were a bit too dramatic.But believe me..This ones a spine  chiller.Recommended.

I think this is the first Bollywood horror movie which is scary and does not have any lead heroine. It is like the Hollywood horror movie. The best thing about this movie is, it does not have any heroine in whom the ghost enters and a hero saves her.
It is completely different. The ghost itself scares the actors.
i really love this movie and give it 4.5/5.
Loved this movie. Genuinely spooky and an honest storyline. Probably the only great horror movie made in Bollywood. I was shocked to see such a bad review rating.

Awesome super duper hit!!!!!!! Like Vikram sir is the leading horror movie director and is every movie is like a WOW!!!cast and crew was fabulous 
Specially KARAN KUNDRA (neel) & RADHIKA MENON  (NEENA) Spot was also very coollll and it is the best horror movie of bollywood ever!!!!!!

Maybe only a Netflix problem, but the ghost's face is censored. Like, even if it's a close up shot. But whenever it isn't, the scene is cut so fast that you'd miss it in a blink of an eye. The only part I got an okay look without replaying a scene was when there was a fire and her face looked like it was projected over the footage while in slow-mo. Thought I'd find someone else review about this, but couldn't.

Inspired by Grave Encounters, but as far as other comparisons go, it's the same cliché plot as every other horror movie.
Some of these reviews make as much sense as the logic used by the characters in this eye-numbingly dull unnecessarily long distraction.
A for effort. 
F for delivery.

If u like 1920...raaz....then u will also like this... Myself like this a lot... 5 friends took challenge to stay one night in haunted hotel.... When they reached there..... Wooo... U should watch at least one time😊
This is one of the best horror movies I've ever seen in Bollywood. It is truly scary and I enjoyed watching the movie.
One of the best horrors in years. This is one  the film which made me scare to the extent that I couldn't sleep. . . . .dare you watch

some movies when we watch them again and again it is still scary

guys im damn sure u will love this movie 100percent this is the best movie i have seen in my entire life.
